name: Escape Together 3D
description:
3D version of submission for GMTK 2021 gamejam with theme "JOINED TOGETHER".

My friend and I created two puzzle-solving games as one submission. Your goal is to beat an escape room, but clues that you find in one game are crucial to solve riddles in another. Both games are joined together with clues and you can't finish one without another.

All assets were created by the two of us during gamejam.

We hope that you will enjoy our little experiment, as much as we were enjoying making it. Have fun!

Link to other game: https://choochoothetrain.itch.io/escape-together-2d
